channel.title: I've coded in 3 years and never seen this problem before
channel.description:
I've coded in 3 years and never seen this problem before :( my problem is like:
i login and i start walking for 1 sec and stop for 3 seconds it's like im lagging big time but my server isn't lagging at all, only my character? all the water and flame animations in-game are running smothly. Lag per ms: 15
last thing edited: extended npc's because i got a: npc out of bounds on my run.bat
really hope anyone from this community can help me. :confused:

item.title: I've coded in 3 years and never seen this problem before
item.dc:creator: @daved daved
item.description:
@daved wrote:

[quote=“rafikd, post:1, topic:331208”]I’ve coded in 3 years and never seen this problem before my problem is like:

i login and i start walking for 1 sec and stop for 3 seconds it’s like im lagging big time but my server isn’t lagging at all, only my character? all the water and flame animations in-game are running smothly. Lag per ms: 15

last thing edited: extended npc’s because i got a: npc out of bounds on my run.bat

really hope anyone from this community can help me. [/quote]

Ok this is one thing you can do:

look into your client.java and study the ignore cases you changed your name to. Test if something is wrong by making another account and playing on it for a bit. See if it also laggs you. Also, try using different clients.

Read full topic
item.source: I've coded in 3 years and never seen this problem before

I hope you find a solution for this!

item.title: I've coded in 3 years and never seen this problem before
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

xxpkpurexx:

ok there r 2 reasons for that either u put a source frm runescape into urs or ur using a 562 because all 562 are 80% rs and 20% private server runescape walking is gay now since they added all these new stuff u would take a step in 2-5 sec takes another thats the reason why i quite rs and started rsps

You don’t know what you’re talking about.

Read full topic
